typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Table as string,
		Field as string,
		Reference_Code as string,
		Reference_Code_Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Ref_Data_ID as integer,
		Ref_Table as string,
		Ref_Field as string,
		Reference_Code as string,
		Reference_Code_Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("select max([Ref_Data_ID]) as LastMaxKey from dbo.REF_Data"),
	format: 'query') ~> source2
source1 keyGenerate(output(Ref_Data_ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(input(
		Ref_Data_ID as integer,
		Ref_Table as string,
		Ref_Field as string,
		Reference_Code as string,
		Reference_Code_Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Ref_Data_ID,
		Reference_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
